import { setWatchList } from "../../redux/rickMortySlice" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' export const Table = ({ col1, col2, col3, col4, display, status, error, mapProps, dataArr, }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const removeHandler = (e) => { localStorage.removeItem(e.currentTarget.id) if (localStorage.length) { let arr = [] for (let i = 0; i < localStorage.length; i++) { let obj = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(localStorage.key(i))) arr.push(obj) } dispatch(setWatchList(arr)) } else { dispatch(setWatchList(null)) } } const displayedWithProps = <> { status === 'loading' ? # Loading... Loading... Loading... : status === 'succeeded' && display.results ? display.results.map((item, i) => {i + 1} {item[mapProps.one]} {item[mapProps.two]} {item[mapProps.three]} { mapProps.four ? {mapProps.four} : null } ) : status === 'succeeded' && display.error ? # Oh no! looks like {display.error.toLowerCase()} : status === 'failed' && error ? # Oh no! looks like {error} : null } const displayedWithoutProps = <> { dataArr ? dataArr.map((item, i) => {i + 1} {item[mapProps.one]} {item[mapProps.two]} {item[mapProps.three]} {mapProps.four} {mapProps.five} ) : null } return ( <> { col4 ? : null } { dataArr === undefined ? displayedWithProps : displayedWithoutProps }
# {col1} {col2} {col3}{col4}
) }
